body:
1. The multiple accounts for multiple guilds story is a lie that they continue to run from because they conspired to have my guilds overrun with commies to actively destroy them. 

2. They only did that after getting destroyed in every comment section where even the discord cabal members weren't enough to brigade down the criticism or up the admins. The cabal members were mostly guilty of the same thing which is why they deleted a mass of alts. (I was just going through those threads, and they're almost all gone). 

3. They banned several Nazi supporters pursuing explanations as to why they abandoned the free speech platform they advertised. They ignored any cabal members' spam, targeted harassment, abuse of alts, etc. which caused a distrust in the admin being honest or fair. 

4. Screenshots proving their bias and cooperation with a small clique of users surfaced which **destroyed** any credibility they had. 

5. Alexa ratings illustrate a drop in traffic after this happened. Even my most anti-nazi adversary @CrystalVulpine took a stand against what they did. I was shocked to find so many people from every party speaking in my defense. 

6. This site surpassed reddit in their dirty dealings. People were getting banned before rules existed for their ban reason. I was no exception. 

7. This site is stagnant now, all the good content contributers left. Even I scaled back my content because it's now mostly unseen. It doesn't even get the downvotes anymore. (And that's before the vote manipulation was implemented). 

8. They had to manipulate an open platform to interfere with free speech. They lied and think people are stupid like they wouldn't notice. They did this, conveniently right as Voat shut down. They even shut down registration to "prevent another Voat" from happening. 

9. I had predicted this every step of the way. I knew they were biased and one sided. I saw the favors for their leftist tranny faggot friends. I pushed the issue and got reactions from the admins which illustrated their prejudice. 

10. I now enjoy seeing you reddifags reeping what you sowed. In preventing another reddit, you actively got the same policies installed that destroyed reddit in the first place. This is why I +WatchRuqqusDie from +FragileRuqqusAdmin lol.

3. They banned several Nazi supporters pursuing explanations as to why they abandoned the free speech platform they advertised. They ignored any cabal members' spam, targeted harassment, abuse of alts, etc. which caused a distrust in the admin being honest or fair. 

4. Screenshots proving their bias and cooperation with a small clique of users surfaced which **destroyed** any credibility they had. 

5. Alexa ratings illustrate a drop in traffic after this happened. Even my most anti-nazi adversary @CrystalVulpine took a stand against what they did. I was shocked to find so many people from every party speaking in my defense.

10. I now enjoy seeing you reddifags reeping what you sowed. In preventing another reddit, you actively got the same policies installed that destroyed reddit in the first place. This is why I +WatchRuqqusDie from +FragileRuqqusAdmin lol.
